Chapter 2 Lisa’s Notes 2.1 Making Blogs in Blogdown and GitHub 2.2 Fork my Project

Chapter 2 Lisa’s Notes 2.1 Making Blogs in Blogdown and GitHub 2.1.1 Initial Setup Make new repository on Github In RStudio, go to File > New Project… and select Version Control > Git Make a file called .Rprofile in your user directory (~) and put the following line in it: options(blogdown.publishDir = "docs") Run the following command in the Console window of RStudio. file.create('docs/.nojekyll') 2.2 Fork my Project Go to [https://github.com/PsyTeachR/R.House.2019] and click on the Fork button in the upper right.
